name: .FOUNTAIN File Extension
summary: Learn about .FOUNTAIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: FOUNTAIN files are saved in a plain text format and can be opened with any text editor. However, to view the screenplay formatting, you will need to open the file in an application that supports Fountain syntax, such as Storyist or Trelby.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
